name: Aura of Worlds
description: Aura of Worlds is a creative tactics roguelite platformer. Explore multiple dangerous worlds where you must utilize your creative abilities and wits to twist the environment to your advantage. Finding your way through ever-changing death labyrinths...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Open GL Version 3.3 or higher Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: .Net framework required; Control Schemes: Mouse and Keyboard as well as Xbox Controller
